name: TodayatMCCSLejeuneNewRiver
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Learn about the array of upcoming events hosted by Marine Corps Community Services at Marine Corps Base Camp Lejeune and Marine Corps Air Station New River. We'll provide daily updates (Monday through Friday) to keep you informed and to get you and your family involved in creating some great memories! Get the full listing of information at MCCSLejeune-New River.com, or follow us on Facebook, at https://www.facebook.com/mccslejeunenewriver/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
